parameter.value: Quick Stop Heat and Speed Control

vbaItem.vbaCode:
Dim myOptions
Const MinDistance = 850 Const MinDistanceLeft = 10 Const MinDistanceRight = 20
Const LeftOffset = 240 'Status Window on the left side Const TopOffset = 80 'Header Const WindowWidth = 1676 'Width of content window Const Margin = 5
'============================================================================== ' Show not implemented window '==============================================================================
Public Sub Show_Details_Window_Above_Object(WindowName, myObject)
'Always use error handling during runtime On Error GoTo ErrHandler '-----------------------
Dim AllDisplays As Displays Dim MyDisplay As Display
Dim objDisplay
Set AllDisplays = Application.LoadedDisplays
On Error Resume Next Set MyDisplay = AllDisplays.Item(WindowName) On Error GoTo ErrHandler
If MyDisplay Is Nothing Then myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name 'MsgBox ("Window Name: " + "Nothing" + " - " + "Options: " + myOptions) Else If (myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name) Then 'MsgBox ("Unload the Window and exit the Sub") MyDisplay.Unload Exit Sub Else 'MsgBox ("Just Unload the Window") myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name MyDisplay.Unload End If End If
Set objDisplay = Application.LoadDisplay(WindowName, myOptions)
objDisplay.Top = MinDistance - objDisplay.Height objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left + (myObject.Width / 2) - (objDisplay.Width / 2)
If (myObject.Name = "CtrlBt_StopQuench") Then objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left + MinDistanceLeft End If
' If (myObject.Name = "NameOfObject") Then ' objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left - objDisplay.Width + myObject.Width ' End If
objDisplay.Visible = True objDisplay.PullForward
Exit Sub '-----------------------
ErrHandler: 'Send error message to event log: Picture name + Sub procedure name + Error description LogDiagnosticsMessage "OJD-FT - " + Application.ActiveDisplay.Name + " ShowNotImplementedWindow: " + Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError Resume Next End Sub
'============================================================================== ' Show local window '==============================================================================
Private Sub Show_Details_Window(WindowName, myObject) 'Always use error handling during runtime On Error GoTo ErrHandler '-----------------------
Dim AllDisplays As Displays Dim MyDisplay As Display
Dim objDisplay
Set AllDisplays = Application.LoadedDisplays
On Error Resume Next Set MyDisplay = AllDisplays.Item(WindowName) On Error GoTo ErrHandler
If MyDisplay Is Nothing Then myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name 'MsgBox ("Window Name: " + "Nothing" + " - " + "Options: " + myOptions) Else If (myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name) Then 'MsgBox ("Unload the Window and exit the Sub") MyDisplay.Unload Exit Sub Else 'MsgBox ("Just Unload the Window") myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name MyDisplay.Unload End If End If
Set objDisplay = Application.LoadDisplay(WindowName, myOptions)
objDisplay.Top = TopOffset + myObject.Top objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left + myObject.Width + Margin If ((objDisplay.Left + objDisplay.Width) > (LeftOffset + WindowWidth)) Then objDisplay.Left = (LeftOffset + myObject.Left) - objDisplay.Width - Margin End If
objDisplay.Visible = True objDisplay.PullForward
'MsgBox ("D-Top: " + Str(objDisplay.Top) + " D-Left: " + Str(objDisplay.Left) + " L-Top: " + Str(MyObject.Top) + " L-Left: " + Str(MyObject.Left))
Exit Sub '-----------------------
ErrHandler: 'Send error message to event log: Picture name + Sub procedure name + Error description LogDiagnosticsMessage "OJD-FT - " + Application.ActiveDisplay.Name + " Show_Details_Window: " + Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError Resume Next End Sub
Private Sub Show_Details_Window_withParameter(WindowName, myObject, myParameterName, Above) 'Always use error handling during runtime On Error GoTo ErrHandler '-----------------------
Dim AllDisplays As Displays Dim MyDisplay As Display
Dim objDisplay
Set AllDisplays = Application.LoadedDisplays
On Error Resume Next Set MyDisplay = AllDisplays.Item(WindowName) On Error GoTo ErrHandler
If MyDisplay Is Nothing Then myOptions = "/T" + myParameterName 'MsgBox ("Window Name: " + "Nothing" + " - " + "Options: " + myOptions) Else If (myOptions = "/T" + myObject.Name) Then 'MsgBox ("Unload the Window and exit the Sub") MyDisplay.Unload Exit Sub Else 'MsgBox ("Just Unload the Window") myOptions = "/T" + myParameterName MyDisplay.Unload End If End If
Set objDisplay = Application.LoadDisplay(WindowName, myOptions)
If Not Above Then objDisplay.Top = TopOffset + myObject.Top objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left + myObject.Width + Margin If ((objDisplay.Left + objDisplay.Width) > (LeftOffset + WindowWidth)) Then objDisplay.Left = (LeftOffset + myObject.Left) - objDisplay.Width - Margin End If Else objDisplay.Top = TopOffset + myObject.Top - objDisplay.Height - myObject.Height objDisplay.Left = LeftOffset + myObject.Left + myObject.Width + Margin If ((objDisplay.Left + objDisplay.Width) > (LeftOffset + WindowWidth)) Then objDisplay.Left = (LeftOffset + myObject.Left) - objDisplay.Width - Margin End If End If
objDisplay.Visible = True objDisplay.PullForward
'MsgBox ("D-Top: " + Str(objDisplay.Top) + " D-Left: " + Str(objDisplay.Left) + " L-Top: " + Str(MyObject.Top) + " L-Left: " + Str(MyObject.Left))
Exit Sub '-----------------------
ErrHandler: 'Send error message to event log: Picture name + Sub procedure name + Error description LogDiagnosticsMessage "OJD-FT - " + Application.ActiveDisplay.Name + " Show_Details_Window: " + Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError Resume Next End Sub
Private Sub Show_Window_with_Parameters(WindowName, para) 'Always use error handling during runtime On Error GoTo ErrHandler '-----------------------
Dim AllDisplays As Displays Dim MyDisplay As Display
Dim objDisplay
Set AllDisplays = Application.LoadedDisplays
On Error Resume Next Set MyDisplay = AllDisplays.Item(WindowName) On Error GoTo ErrHandler
If MyDisplay Is Nothing Then myOptions = para 'MsgBox ("Window Name: " + "Nothing" + " - " + "Options: " + myOptions) Else If (myOptions = para) Then 'MsgBox ("Unload the Window and exit the Sub") MyDisplay.Unload Exit Sub Else 'MsgBox ("Just Unload the Window") myOptions = para MyDisplay.Unload End If End If
Set objDisplay = Application.LoadDisplay(WindowName, myOptions)
objDisplay.Visible = True objDisplay.PullForward
'MsgBox ("D-Top: " + Str(objDisplay.Top) + " D-Left: " + Str(objDisplay.Left) + " L-Top: " + Str(MyObject.Top) + " L-Left: " + Str(MyObject.Left))
Exit Sub '-----------------------
ErrHandler: 'Send error message to event log: Picture name + Sub procedure name + Error description LogDiagnosticsMessage "OJD-FT - " + Application.ActiveDisplay.Name + " Show_Details_Window: " + Err.Description, ftDiagSeverityError Resume Next End Sub
